description: Use store-bought pizza dough to create this festive centrepiece. Friends and family are sure to delight in biting into the soft, cream cheese centre.
name: Cheat's Cheesy Pull-Apart Wreath Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Lightly spray a 21cm (9cm deep) bundt pan with oil. Cut each dough ball into 16 pieces. Cut cheese into 32 pieces. Roll dough into balls. Push a piece of cheese into each ball and pinch to enclose, ensuring cheese is completely covered.
Place balls in pan. Cover loosely and set aside at room temperature to prove for 15 minutes.
Spray dough with oil, then sprinkle over sesame and poppy seeds. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, roughly chop most of the parsley. Place chopped parsley, garlic, zest, lemon juice and oil in a food processor and process until combined.
Stand bread in pan to cool slightly, then carefully transfer to a platter. Serve wreath drizzled with herb oil and scattered with remaining parsley.
